api_endpoint.reasoning: Most relevant endpoint for creating time off entries in Workday
api_endpoint.required_structure: Complex nested structure with employee and timeOff objects

employee_external_id.notes: Maps to the employee reference object's ID field, which represents the worker requesting time off. Requires resolution from external employee ID to Workday worker ID.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Maps to the Time Off plan ID, which represents the type of absence/time off. Requires resolution from external absence type ID to Workday time off plan ID.

status.notes: Maps to the status of the time off request business process. Represents the current state of the absence request.

start_date.notes: Direct mapping to the date field for the time off entry. Workday uses single-date entries, not date ranges.

end_date.ground_truth_path: N/A - Workday uses single-date entries, not date ranges
end_date.notes: Workday API uses single-date entries rather than date ranges. End date would need to be handled by creating multiple entries or using a different approach.

start_half_day.ground_truth_path: N/A - Field not present in API request schema
start_half_day.notes: Workday API doesn't support half-day concept in the time off entry structure

end_half_day.ground_truth_path: N/A - Field not present in API request schema
end_half_day.notes: Workday API doesn't support half-day concept in the time off entry structure

amount.notes: Maps to the units field which represents the amount of time off requested. May require data type conversion from number to integer.

unit.ground_truth_path: N/A - Field not present in API request schema
unit.notes: Workday API doesn't track units separately - uses units field for amount

employee_note.ground_truth_path: N/A - Field not present in API request schema
employee_note.notes: Workday API doesn't accept employee notes in the time off entry structure

required_conversions.conversion_method: Resolve external employee ID to Workday worker ID
Resolve external absence type ID to Workday time off plan ID
Convert to integer for units field

nested_structure_requirements.structure: Must be wrapped in employee object with id property
Must be wrapped in timeOff object with id property

data_conversions: Resolve external employee ID to Workday worker ID
Resolve external absence type ID to Workday time off plan ID
Convert amount to integer for units field
missing_fields_handling: end_date: Create multiple single-date entries for date ranges
half_day fields: Convert to full day logic or handle separately
unit: Use units field for amount calculations
employee_note: Store elsewhere or find alternative field
validation_requirements: All mapped fields are required in API request
employee.id must be valid Workday worker ID
timeOff.id must be valid Workday time off plan ID
Date field must be in proper format
business_logic_considerations: API requires complex nested structure with employee and timeOff objects
All mapped fields must be present for successful request
Consider implementing validation for required field completeness
May need to create multiple entries for date ranges
